message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11,500. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to you. What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking of something more like $9,500. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $9,500 is simply too low for me. I'm willing to come down a bit further, but I can't go below $10,500. This is still a great price considering the value of the product to you.  Let me know if you're interested.
I understand your concerns, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $10,000? I'm willing to compromise, but I really need to stay within my budget
